title: Freshwater Fish
description: Cast your knowledge into the world of freshwater fish found in rivers, lakes, and streams worldwide.

questions.question: Which freshwater fish is the largest, sometimes exceeding 600 pounds?
Salmon are famous for doing what at the end of their life cycle?
options: Returning to their birthplace to spawn

questions.question: What popular game fish is known as 'largemouth' and 'smallmouth' varieties?
The piranha, known for its sharp teeth, is native to rivers in which continent?
Which colorful freshwater fish is one of the most popular aquarium fish in the world?
Trout are members of which fish family?
The electric eel, which can produce up to 860 volts, lives in the rivers of which region?
What is the common name for Cyprinus carpio, a fish originally from Asia now found worldwide?
Which Great Lake is famous for its lake trout and whitefish populations?
What bottom-dwelling freshwater fish has whisker-like barbels around its mouth?
The arapaima, one of the largest freshwater fish, is found in which river system?
What invasive fish species has become a major problem in the waterways of the American South?
Which freshwater fish can breathe air and survive on land for short periods?
The sturgeon, prized for its caviar, can live for how many years?
What popular sport fish is also called 'walleye' due to its distinctive eyes?
